solution_line_template: The remains of the second popsicle melt {multiplier} * {first_speed} = <<{multiplier}*{first_speed}={second_speed}>>{second_speed} times as fast as the first.
The remains of the third popsicle melt {multiplier} * {second_speed} = <<{multiplier}*{second_speed}={third_speed}>>{third_speed} times as fast as the first.
The remains of the fourth popsicle melt {multiplier} * {third_speed} = <<{multiplier}*{third_speed}={fourth_speed}>>{fourth_speed} times as fast as the first.
The remains of the fifth popsicle melt {multiplier} * {fourth_speed} = {fifth_speed} times as fast as the first.
The remains of the sixth popsicle melt {multiplier} * {fifth_speed} = <<{multiplier}*{fifth_speed}={sixth_speed}>>{sixth_speed} times as fast as the first popsicle.
